mapper.select: select s2.id,s2.resource_name,s2.resource_path,s1.role_auth from sys_roles s1 ,sys_resources s2,sys_roles_resources s3 where s1.id = s3.role_id and s3.resource_id = s2.id and s1.`enable`=1 and s2.`enable`=1

select s4.id, s4.resource_type, s4.resource_name, s4.resource_desc, s4.resource_path, s4.resource_parent, s4.enable, s4.resource_icon, s4.order_no, s4.resource_level, s4.btn_style, s4.btn_index from sys_users_roles s1,sys_roles s2 ,sys_roles_resources s3,sys_resources s4 where s1.role_id=s2.id and s2.id=s3.role_id and s3.resource_id = s4.id and s1.user_id=#{userId} and s4.`enable`=1 and s4.resource_type = 'url' order by s4.order_no

select * from sys_resources where 1=1
and id =#{id}
and resource_name like CONCAT('%',#{resource_name},'%')
order by order_no ASC

select sr.id, sr.resource_name,sr.resource_path,s3.role_auth from sys_resouce_btn srb ,sys_resources sr,sys_roles s3 where srb.resouce_btn_id = sr.id and srb.role_id= s3.id and s3.`enable`=1 and sr.`enable`=1

select sr.id, sr.resource_type,sr. resource_name, sr.resource_desc, sr.resource_path, sr.resource_parent, sr.enable, sr.resource_icon, sr.order_no, sr.resource_level, sr.btn_style,sr. btn_index from sys_resources sr where sr.id in (select srb.resouce_btn_id from sys_resouce_btn srb where srb.resouce_menu_id = #{menuId} and srb.role_id=#{roleId}) and sr.btn_index=#{index} and sr.enable = 1 order by sr.btn_index,sr.order_no asc
